title: How to Draw a Koi Fish

steps.title: To do so, draw a rounded triangle.
steps.content: To do so, draw a rounded triangle. Inside this shape, draw a circle.

steps.title: This oval will be coming off the upper right of the rounded triangle.
steps.content: This oval will be coming off the upper right of the rounded triangle. Narrow the oval towards the end. This will be the body of the fish.

steps.title: This M-like shape will be the tail.
steps.content: This M-like shape will be the tail.

steps.title: Draw another smaller one on the exterior right side of the head.
steps.content: Draw another smaller one on the exterior right side of the head. These will become the fins.

steps.title: Add details (such as whiskers) as you go.
steps.content: Add details (such as whiskers) as you go. Also, add details on the fins.

steps.title: Add the scales on the body.
steps.content: Add the scales on the body.
